Oasis Singles

Live Forever (1994)

Single Statistics

  • Release Date: August 8, 1994
  • UK Chart Position: #10
  • Weeks on Chart: 16
  • Sales: Over 225,000 copies (UK)
  • Parent Album: Definitely Maybe

B-Sides

  • Up in the Sky (Acoustic)
  • Cloudburst
  • Supersonic (Live)

Recording Details

Recorded at Loco Studios, Wales in 1993. The song was written by Noel Gallagher and became one of the band's signature tracks.

Cigarettes & Alcohol (1994)

Single Statistics

  • Release Date: October 10, 1994
  • UK Chart Position: #7
  • Weeks on Chart: 14
  • Sales: Over 260,000 copies (UK)
  • Parent Album: Definitely Maybe

B-Sides

  • I Am The Walrus (Live Glasgow Cathouse June '94)
  • Listen Up
  • Fade Away

Chart Performance

The single became their first UK top 10 hit and established them as one of Britain's leading rock bands.
